definition: International Association of Athletics Federations (IAAF)/abbr. for 國際田徑聯合會|国际田径联合会[Guo2 ji4 Tian2 jing4 Lian2 he2 hui4]
to ally/to unite/to join/(poetry) antithetical couplet

sentences.english: The IAAF has responded by urging caution over the reports.
sentences.chinese: 國際田聯已經做出迴應，敦促謹慎對待這些報道。

sentences.english: Now the IAAF has a total of 213 member federation.
sentences.chinese: 現在國際田聯共有213個會員國。

sentences.english: He's confirmed to take part in the IAAF's Diamond League meet in Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 他已確認參賽國際田聯鑽石聯賽上海站。
